headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https: https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://*.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' data: https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self' https://maps.googleapis.com; media-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
autoplay=(), camera=(), gyroscope=(), magnetometer=(), microphone=(), payment=(), publickey-credentials-get=()
